name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicExtraLargeCircularStackImage
desc: A template for displaying an extra-large, full-color circular image and text.

items.name: init(line1ImageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider, line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template with an image and a small amount of text.

items.name: var line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display below the image.
